section.name: Accounting of purchase returns.
section.p:
On 16 Jan Bob found what 12 eggs and 1 pound of cheese are not fresh. At first he switched off method #31 "PurchaseReturn, Debit ReturnsReceivable.DebtorCreditor Credit SalesTaxFromPurchReturns.Tax for Tax amount. Accrual Symmetric." in the accounting settings. Then he has made purchase return to Carlo's grocery:
* since 1.1.7 version, you can change cost (it's still picked automatically), and you can change tax amount (if taxes are extracted from purchase).
Field Site from is optional. If it's empty then withdrawal will be from the first warehouse site/s with available item/s.

Purchase return makes complex accounting, warehouse and draw goods entries:
* software makes automatically report about rounding error - "7.0100!=7.0063!" in this case.
